alert.note: Alert for Door; Kewaunee; Manitowoc; Marathon; Portage; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 15 at 1:09PM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Marathon, Portage, Wood, Manitowoc, Door, Kewaunee, Shawano, Southern Marinette County and Southern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 PM CST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Some power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Door; Kewaunee; Manitowoc; Marathon; Portage; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Wood
